law.text: The purpose of KRS 154.50-301 to 154.50-346 is to create local industrial development authorities to aid in the acquisition, retention and development of land for industrial and commercial purposes in Kentucky; to aid in the development and promotion of industrial sites, parks and subdivisions for accommodating industrial and commercial needs; to promote and stimulate the acquisition, retention and development of land for industrial and commercial purposes in Kentucky by other local development organizations both public and private.
